SELECT COUNT(t.consumptionCnt>0 OR NULL) AS arrivalCnt, COUNT(t.consumptionCnt IS NULL OR NULL) AS pendingCnt, COUNT(t.consumptionCnt>0 AND dcg.create_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') OR NULL) AS newArrivalCnt, COUNT(t.consumptionCnt IS NULL AND dcg.create_date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') OR NULL) AS newPendingCnt FROM d_customer_group dcg LEFT JOIN ( SELECT do.customer_group_id, COUNT(*) consumptionCnt FROM d_order_consumption doc LEFT JOIN d_order do ON do.id = doc.order_id GROUP BY do.customer_group_id ) t ON t.customer_group_id = dcg.id WHERE dcg.type = 1
AND dcg.group_id = #{groupId}
